schema.name: healthyfied ice cream sandwich

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the Mike's Keto Bread if not pre-sliced.
In a bowl, beat the egg and mix with unsweetened almond milk.
Dip each slice of bread into the egg and almond milk mixture, ensuring both sides are well coated.
In a non-stick skillet over medium heat, cook the dipped bread slices for about 2-3 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
Allow the cooked bread slices to cool slightly.
Spread 1 tbsp of chocolate ice cream on one slice of the slightly cooled bread, then top with the other slice to form a sandwich.
Serve immediately or freeze for a firmer ice cream texture.

schema.description: Indulge in a guilt-free treat with our Healthyfied Ice Cream Sandwich, perfect for those following a high-protein, low-carb, and low-sugar diet. Enjoy the union of homemade Mike's Keto Bread with rich chocolate ice cream, offering a smarter choice for your dessert cravings.
